name: Doomba Rampage
description:
Doomba was tired of his old garden and decided to go on a rampage through the forest. On the way he mows down everything in his way to reach freedom.

PS: He has a gun and a chainsaw.

Doomba Rampage was conceptualized as part of a student project at the Zurich University of Arts (ZHdK) . Our task was to create an adventure game within half a day. 

The Team consisted of 18 students.
